item.description:
NEW LOCATION !

Join John, our host, at DAMATAS 33 bridge st Salem for a Kitty Whist Card Game Night.

Don't be scared off by the title of the game, no experience is necessary, we will be a learning how to play the game on the game night. It is the easiest Whist game to learn, with an element of randomness built into the game (the 4 unknown cards, "the kitty"). Regardless of if you have ever played a whist game before, now is the time to learn.

Everyone will meet up at 6:30 p.m.

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Kitty Whist Night at DAMATAS
